title: Pic-nic
creator_credit: Film Victoria, Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, John Bird, David Atkinson and Stella Babirz
brief_description: One of the seven deadly sins, gluttony, is explored when a group of aristocrats picnic together. Not content just to eat the food, the guests turn to their classical environment to devour and eventually turn on themselves. An adventure with appetite. Voices by Vanessa Kortlang, Allannah Hill, Noel Crombie, Stella Babirz.
